text: Zalman Shazar (; born Shneur Zalman Rubashov; ; ; November 24, 1889 â€“ October 5, 1974) was an Israeli politician, author and poet. Shazar was the third President of Israel for two terms, from 1963 to 1973. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Presidents of Israel Category:Israeli journalists Category:Israeli poets
title: Zalman Shazar
